entry.title: Morning Dew
entry.summary:
Author: Samandiriel (kyra516)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,978Chapters: 1/10Kudos: 0

Summary: Stiles had always been a bit of an odd bunny compared to his peers. He had this sense of adventure and the need to explore! His father said he got most of it from his late mother. His father also called it recklessness and lack of self-preservation. Most of the time, Stiles just dismissed his father as being plain wrong.Today however? Today he reckoned his father was completely and truly right in his judgement. Because today, Stiles had made the most reckless and stupid decision of his life. You see, Stiles had the brilliant idea of venturing into wolf lands to do some gathering, and so here he was, on the other side of the river, in the unknown lands that no bunny before him had dared to venture into. What could possibly go wrong?It was all Jackson's fault anyway.  ---The story is finished and will be fully published either by me, or in case of my death, by my friend. You will not be left hanging. ---

entry.title: Bambi
entry.summary:
Author: Here_to_procrastinate

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,671Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 213

Summary: Noah Stilinski dies when Stiles is eleven years old. Gerard finds him when he has nowhere to go but a lot to prove.//Gerard takes Stiles in after his father’s death, and together, they leave Beacon Hills. Now, five years later, they’re back to take care of the local werewolf pack.Really, it’s Gerard’s fault for never asking in what way Stiles plans on taking care of them.

entry.title: On thin ice
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,003Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 20

Summary: Stiles Stilinski has spent his life running—from places, from people, from memories he’d rather bury. But no matter how much he tries to disappear, Derek Hale is always there, dragging him back to reality with sharp words and an infuriating presence.Derek has never understood why Stiles hates him so much, but after years of biting remarks and silent battles, he’s stopped caring. Or at least, that’s what he tells himself.But when buried secrets begin to surface and the fine line between rivalry and obsession blurs, Stiles and Derek realize that maybe what exists between them was never just hatred.And the harder they try to pull away, the more they seem to be drawn into something dangerous—where desire and pain walk hand in hand.

entry.title: all the things i did (just so i could call you mine)
entry.summary:
Author: xohollandox

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,651Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 22

Summary: Derek actively avoided being alone with his thoughts, and with Stiles almost constantly by his side and constantly talking his ear off, he had done this pretty successfully. But now, with Stiles in a coma for the past month, there was nothing Derek could do but be stuck in his own head, and unfortunately the only thoughts that would play in Derek’s head were the ones that had gotten Stiles into this situation in the first place.OR Stiles gets amnesia and Derek crashes out

entry.summary:

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,630Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 11

Summary: “Sister, I swear if you attempt to— Lord Stiles.” Stiles turned to see a familiar face, his heart skipping a beat. It was Derek, the man he had run into this evening was him all along. entry.title: Contradictory Impossibilities
entry.summary:
Author: sifshadowheart

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 61,355Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 1,154

Summary: Harry and his Circle were having a nice relaxing evening at home when out of nowhere, two of their kids (they were adults, well versed and set in their dynamics, but they'd always be Harry's kids) were snatched away in a Soul Scream.It's from a tiny little speck on the Earth map called Beacon Hills, California.The Submissive in distress? None other than one Stiles Stilinski, resident trouble-magnet and pain-in-the-ass, who'd had his inheritance suppressed until enough trauma and sheer need and pain had shattered the seals he was under.And unleashed something inside of him that was never meant to see the light of day.Or the love of a Circle of his very own.

entry.title: Stiles Come Home
entry.summary:
Author: SpaceAce281990

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 207,616Chapters: 27/?Kudos: 654

Summary: Stiles was kidnapped from the hospital, hours after being born. He was raised by a misguided spark who thought he was hers and then taken away and placed in foster care. Sheriff John Stilinski had never stopped looking for his son, efforts doubling once his wife died and his son's case went cold. When he gets the call that the woman who had stolen his son had come forward, confessed, and he provides what he needs to prove that Stiles is his son, he is elated, emotional, and scared. What had his son went through all of those years and could he work to be the father he had always wanted to be?And could he answer Stiles' first question. "Are you Batman?"

entry.title: The Alpha and The Spark
entry.summary:
Author: Angeleyz4ever

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 54,335Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 16

Summary: FBI Agent Stiles Stilinski's special team was supposed to save a old world werewolf pack that was reported to be wiped out by hunters. Yet when they arrive the camp becomes all out chaos.Stiles and his two charges are lucky to make it out alive. So he messages the only person he can trust that would be able to help him... his Sourwolf. Derek Hale races to find Stiles so they can flee across country, taking their charges to the only place they know they can keep them safe. Even when Stiles is wanted by the FBI and the resident Alpha is throwing a tantrum.Can they stop an all out war and how is it the FBI has turned on Stiles? At the end of the day, can Stiles and Derek save everyone and themselves while trying to make a life for themselves together or will they die trying?

entry.title: Boys Aren't Flowers (reposted)
entry.summary:
Author: Some_Teen_Wolf_Girlie (Just_A_Girl_336)

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,056Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 16

Summary: I accidentally orphaned this. I contacted AO3 support but Idk how much they can do about it. I'm just reposting the old chapters and then adding the latest ones.Isaac wants to get out of the house. In doing so, he meets a boy, Scott. It's great, like most things start off as. Eventually, Isaac settles with knowing Scott is out of reach. A summer later and a werewolf bite, Isaac is able to look at Scott and not live in regret. Not free just yet, Isaac will be seeing Scott more often as supernatural threats taunt the town. Repairing something Isaac purposely destroyed was not part of the goal, but there he was. Derek insists he get over it, but it's easy for him to say as a ball of regret and resent. Isaac will have to come to terms with everything around him, so he doesn't fall apart.I also don't feel comfortable writing about big enough age gaps surrounding the age of consent, so ages will be adjusted. The sophomores will be turning 17 and thusly that's when this starts off. Derek, he might be 20 for my sanity.I will only imply/reference any domestic violence...writing it makes everyone miserable. I'll convey the mindset of the pre and post, but not write. I don't think it needs a warn, but let me know.

entry.title: Bitter Memories (sweet beginnings)
entry.summary:
Author: noninsense

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 764Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 3

Summary: The fire never really left him.It lives in the charred remains of his childhood, in the ghosts that whisper through the empty halls of what once was home. It’s in the way he flinches at the scent of smoke, the way heat prickles at his skin like an unwanted memory.It’s in the silence of his mornings, where he can almost hear the echoes of voices that don’t exist anymore.

entry.title: insomnia is for the weak and the dying (Stiles is only one of those)
entry.summary:
Author: whoscountinganyway

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,819Chapters: 9/20Kudos: 525

Summary: After a few moments where Stiles has given him nothing, Derek growls at himself (which, no, doesn’t make Stiles more flustered, what are you talking about?) and admits: “My instincts,” A pause, like he’s mad. “Like you.”What comes next is absolutely out of Stiles’ control. Blame the poking—his lack of filter—curiosity—anything other than him. But Stiles looks at him, mouth hung open just a little that makes his dad say something about flies, and asks, “Your instincts, or you?”**Stiles has this terrible crush.Him and Scott get into a fight and it's kind of about Derek, but also, not really that at all.

entry.title: You're The One To Blame
entry.summary:
Author: writteninthewolfstar

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,692Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 28

Summary: Scott McCall’s army falls and he is taken prisoner by his greatest enemy, Derek Hale. The man who has taken everything from him.The man who had long ago raided his city and dragged his best friend away while he kicked and screamed for help.It’s all Derek’s fault. And Scott wants him dead.(This is a flash forward prologue for You're Not Who I Thought You Were . IT CAN BE READ FIRST, SECOND, OR AS A STAND ALONE)
